Module documentation¶

Modules¶

tools.data_input.GenomeData.modify_fasta(input_fasta_file, new_fasta_prefix, output_file)¶

The input is a fasta file. This will rename the file with the new ID, and modify each ID in each entry of the fasta file

tools.data_input.GenomeData.read_genome_list(input_file)¶

This function reads the genome list, and process that information. The format is:

First column, ID of the genome depending the annotation source (IMG, JGI, Genbank)

Second column: Full species name

Third column: Prefix to use in the analysis

Parameters:input_file – Genome list
Returns:Dictionary with genome information, and total count
